name: UITimingCurveType
desc: Constants indicating the type of timing information to use.

items.name: case builtin
items.desc: Use the built-in UIKit timing curves. Specify this value when you want to use one of the constants in the UIView.AnimationCurve type. Specify the desired curve using the cubicTimingParameters property.

items.name: case cubic
items.desc: Use a custom cubic BÃ©zier curve. Specify the curve information using the cubicTimingParameters property.

items.name: case spring
items.desc: Use a custom spring animation. Specify the desired curve using the springTimingParameters property.

items.name: case composed
items.desc: Use a combination of timing parameters. This type of curve starts with the curve defined by the cubicTimingParameters property and modifies it using the spring information in the springTimingParameters property.
